message: FINAL RECOMMENDATION FOR IMPLEMENTATION PHASE: Use EXPLANATION_FORMAT_SUMMARY.md as primary reference (quick lookup) and EXPLANATION_FORMAT_GUIDELINES.md for detailed examples. Key standards: CORRECT explanations 30-60 words explaining WHY with citations; INCORRECT explanations 20-40 words each explaining WHY that specific option is wrong. Format tested across 48 questions shows high consistency and educational value. Implementation agents should follow the 5-Second Quality Rule and Quality Checklist before submitting any week.
